entries.description: Respect the `duration_seconds` property when assuming a role if set on the profile
Added support for AWS profiles that use the `credential_source` key
Fix Python Lambda gutter icons not generating handler paths relative to the requirements.txt file (#2853)
Fix file changes not being saved before running Local Lambda run configurations (#2889)
Fix incorrect behavior with RDS Secrets Manager Auth when SSH tunneling is enabled (#2781)
Fix copying out of the DynamoDB table viewer copying the in-memory representation instead of displayed value
Fix error about write actions when opening files from the S3 browser (#2913)
Fix NullPointerException on combobox browse components (#2866)
Dropped support for the no longer supported Lambda runtime .NET Core 2.1
